node.title: What Every Lay Member Ought To Know About Using Graphic Design To Win People to Christ
node.description: Is your design making a difference in reaching people for Christ? If you want to be an effective visual communicator of the gospel in your marketplace, then this seminar is for you. We will look at real case studies, and learn how to package our message visually to create a powerful communication vehicle. We will go through seven steps in the creative process, from idea to delivery, drawing from professional best practice, biblical inspiration and practical experience. You won't walk out of the seminar a graphic designer, but you will look at your world in a different way!
